text:
In and of itself this film is fine. It has plenty of thrills, a solid central performance and some stunning set pieces. Nothing wrong with that. It makes for some enertaining sci-fi/horror shenanigans.

But that's not what this film is. This film is based on one of the most influential novels in the genre, not only in literature but nost definitely in film as well. It practically kick-started the post apocalypted zombie genre. It is a strong plot with anâ€¦
